scenario_text.value: Oh, Takuma, it’s you.

You seem pretty down, Miu. Did something
happen?
Yeah... But I think I’m okay.

You sure you don’t want to talk about it?
Don’t worry, I can keep a secret.

(It’ll probably just be more complaining
about Kaito. They’re at it again, for sure.)
All right, then.

Let me ask you, Takuma, do you really want to
go back to our world?
Huh? Miu, what are you asking here?

Well, to tell you the truth, I’m not sure
I want to go back.

(Well, I wasn’t expecting that! What am
I supposed to say now?)

How do I respond to Miu’s unexpected
question?
Why not?
You like it here?
Then get stronger.
But why wouldn’t you want to go back?
Oh, uh, well... Ahaha, just kidding!
What?

Gotcha that time! I just wanted to see the
look on your face when I said that.

The whole thing was a joke! Go ahead and
forget all about it, okay?
Jeeze, Miu, you really had me going there!

Heheh, I got you good, didn’t I? Oh, and
since it was a joke, don’t tell Kaito, okay?
(Oh, that Miu...)

(But still... I wonder if she wasn’t entirely
joking...)
So, you like it here?

Listen, Takuma, tell me what you really
think, okay?
I mean, uh...
No, seriously. I want your honest opinion.

(So, she’s ignoring my question and insisting
I answer hers instead.)

(It’s like she’s either testing me or trying
to get out of answering.)
Then you’ll have to get stronger.
...What do you mean?

I’m saying, in this world, everything is
a matter of life or death.
So you have to be strong.
...Oh, yeah, you’re right.

I guess in that sense, this world is just
like ours.

(Hm? Did Miu just say what I thought she
said?)
Well, thanks for listening, Takuma.
See you around.
(Oh no, Miu’s...gone.)

(She seemed kind of upset. I hope she’s
okay...)
